0022500761.injuryImpact: All Core 5 starters are healthy and available. ADVANTAGE: Detroit Pistons will be without Tobias Harris. This weakens their rotation significantly. Detroit's Cade Cunningham, Jalen Duren are questionable - monitor for updates. Cunningham has been managing a wrist injury and played 38 minutes Thursday. Duren left Thursday's game early with knee soreness. If both are limited or out, expect the line to move 3-5 points toward Charlotte. Net injury edge: +4.5 pts in Hornets' favor.
